title: Asssignment2
content: ×body { background-color:Blue; } #Heading { font-family:"Impact"; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px red; font-size:35px; position: relative } #SelectOne { font-family:"Impact"; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px red; position: absolute; padding-left: 20%; padding-top: 10%; z-index:4; } #PLAY { position: absolute; padding-left: 50%; padding-top: 15%; z-index:3; } #Computer { font-family:"Impact"; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px red; position: absolute; padding-left: 75%; padding-top: 10%; } #Results { font-size: 25px; font-family:"Impact"; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px red; position: absolute; padding-left:51%; padding-top: 20%; } #History { font-family:"Impact"; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px red; position: absolute; padding-left: 20%; padding-top: 25%; } #Heading { text-align: center; } #COMPHIST { font-family:"Impact"; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px red; position: absolute; padding-left: 75%; padding-top: 25%; } #RES { font-family:"Impact"; color: white; text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px red; color: red; font-size:30px; }
